long_description: The classic C Crane CCRadio EP radio offers AM/FM listening pleasure with pure, simple performance. No clock to set, no station presets to program-just turn it on and tune it in. Bass, treble, voice and music knobs let you adjust for optimal sound. Internal/external antenna switch; AM stations with weak reception can be fine-tuned with manual adjustment of the built-in twin coil antenna. "F" connector accommodates an external FM antenna (not included); radio also features line-in and headphone jacks. The C Crane CCRadio EP radio features a flip-up carry handle, AC adapter and LED lighted analog dial; it also runs on 4 D batteries (sold separately).
short_description: The classic C Crane CCRadio EP radio offers AM/FM listening pleasure with pure, simple performance. No clock to set, no station presets to program-just turn it on and tune it in.
